title: Jason Sepúlveda | Data Portfolio
description: I am Jason, Data Analyst and Business Professional
name: Jason Sepúlveda
skill: Data Analyst | Business Intelligence | Project Manager
about:
A business professional with a deep understanding of technology, bridging the gap between strategic business goals and technical solutions. Over nine years of professional experience in Marketing, Sales, and Data Analysis have been accumulated across both the construction and technology industries, focusing on leveraging technical skills in Python, SQL, Power BI, Tableau, and SAP. Leadership has been demonstrated in managing cross-functional teams, improving processes, and delivering real-time data insights through digital solutions. 
 Strong expertise in communication, team collaboration, and project management has contributed to successfully driving digital transformation and optimizing customer experiences. Planning and execution of agile projects have consistently resulted in enhanced business outcomes and team empowerment.

experience.title: Regional CX Project Manager | Data Analyst
experience.subtitle: Hilti | Panama
experience.description: I am leading strategic initiatives to enhance customer satisfaction across multiple markets, aligning them with corporate goals. I manage a Data Quality project involving over 50 stakeholders in Latin America, focusing on improving key SAP data fields to optimize the customer experience journey. Additionally, I have developed an ETL process using Python and SQL to collect and extract data from SAP, transforming it into actionable insights through real-time Power BI visualizations, ensuring data-driven decision-making.

experience.title: Regional eCommerce Expert | Marketing Data Analyst
experience.subtitle: Hilti | Panama
experience.description: I was leading eCommerce strategies for six Latin American countries using agile methodologies, acting as the single point of contact (SPOC) for Global Product Owners in the region. I managed digital projects with JIRA to implement new features and improve the customer experience. I also led marketing automation efforts, creating and testing automated engagement campaigns to boost digital sales. Additionally, I developed data dashboards using SQL Server, Power BI, SAP BW, and Google Analytics to enable informed business decisions.

experience.title: Software Fild Specialist
experience.subtitle: Hilti | Chile
experience.description: I led the implementation of specialized construction software across four key management areas in Chile, enhancing client operations through digital solutions. By applying lean methodologies, I streamlined workflows and delivered measurable cost savings for clients. I also spearheaded digital transformation projects, introducing software tools that boosted productivity and reduced operational costs on job sites. Analyzing client needs, I calculated potential ROI and implemented tailored solutions. Additionally, I ensured seamless software adoption through effective project management, training, and ongoing support to maximize efficiency and operational effectiveness.

projects.title: Material Availability Tool
projects.subtitle: ETL Process for real-time information from SAP
projects.description: Collect, clean information with Python and upload datasets to SQL server to connect Power BI to display insights to internal customers

projects.title: Completed User Registration
projects.subtitle: Power BI Dashboard with users registration in eCommerce
projects.description: Power BI visualization for the sales team, displaying characteristics of registered users in each of their territories. All data was sourced from the company's Business Warehouse and stored in SQL Server.
